data.title: National Conference on Cultural Property Protection
data.meta_description: Senior Trainer, The J. Paul Getty Trust
data.meta_site_name: National Conference on Cultural Property Protection
data.text:
2024

Speakers

Deanna Arisdakessian

Senior Trainer, The J. Paul Getty Trust

Deanna Arisdakessian has over 9 years of experience in the field of learning and development. She specializes in creating impactful training programs and fostering continuous learning environments for the Getty’s frontline staff, while continuously striving to leverage the latest technologies and methodologies to create interactive and effective learning experiences. She holds a bachelor’s degree in art history from the University of California, Los Angeles. When not working, Arisdakessian enjoys travelling with her husband, creating digital art, and hosting parties with family and friends.
